original_title: La fessée ou Les mémoires de monsieur Léon maître-fesseur
overview: Respectable Monsieur Léon, nicely portrayed by Antoine Fontaine, is an unassuming bank teller by day, lover for hire with a specialist sideline in spanking by night!
title: The Spanking (or The Memoirs of Mr. Leon - Spanking Professor)
